topics.body:
So, remember a few weeks ago I was talking about shaving my groin area because it was hot and itchy? And I did but it was still itchy, albeit less?

Apparently, the itchy part was because I have contact dermatitis. Now, it may sound worrying because of its scientific name and all but it's nothing too serious. It's basically red areas (and pores if serious) in my groin area which is itchy due to an allergic reaction or heat. It's genetic so it will never heal completely.

It's not that bad really. The doctor said that I should apply the moistening cream everyday and a relief agent if it's really itchy. I should also trim my nails frequently so that I won't scratch it.

So, yeah...

topics.body:
Discipline is very important in nurturing a child.

You need to balance the positive and negative reinforcement in order for a child to grow well.
If all you do is reward a child when he do good and protects the child when he does bad, it will only create a brat who thinks he's king of the world.

When nurturing a child in making decisions, you must teach them that good choices give rewards and bad ones have consequences. You must punish them if they do wrong but also remember to hold back since they are young. 

A great parent isn't a parent who loves their child deeply. 
Any parent can do that.
A great parent is a parent who teaches them to be a better person.
